meanings.definition: Free from pretense or deceit; genuine.
meanings.sent1: Her smile was sincerer than anyone else's in the room.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your sincerer efforts to help me.
meanings.sent3: His sincerer apology made everyone forgive him instantly.
meanings.sent4: The sincerer emotions in her eyes spoke volumes.
meanings.sent5: The sincerer tone of his voice convinced me of his honesty.

meanings.sent1: The sincerer friendship they shared was evident to all.
meanings.sent2: His sincerer intentions were clear from the start.
meanings.sent3: The sincerer look on his face made me burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her sincerer love for animals was heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The sincerer joy in her eyes was contagious.

meanings.sent1: His sincerer concern for her well-being was touching.
meanings.sent2: The sincerer emotions in his words were palpable.
meanings.sent3: She gave him a sincerer hug than she had ever given before.
meanings.sent4: The sincerer smile on her face lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: His sincerer gratitude brought tears to her eyes.
